SELECT DISTINCT(tc.comp_id), tc.comp_nm, tu.loginID, tu.password, tu.name, tu.phone FROM tb_userinfo tu JOIN tb_comp tc ON tc.loginID=tu.loginID
JOIN tb_import ti ON ti.comp_id=tc.comp_id JOIN tb_sales ts ON ts.sales_id=ti.sales_id
AND ts.sales_nm
AND tc.comp_nm
LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
AND ts.sales_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR tc.comp_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY tc.comp_nm LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{rowsPerPage}

JOIN tb_import ti ON ti.comp_id=tc.comp_id JOIN tb_sales ts ON ts.sales_id=ti.sales_id
AND ts.sales_nm
AND tc.comp_nm
LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
AND ts.sales_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR tc.comp_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
